fields.description: There are many "# TODO: Don't use global includes but rather target_include_directories" comments in {{cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake}}.
fields.summary: [C++][CMake] Use target instead of include_directories(SYSTEM) to add include path
